name: High-Visibility Vote Buttons
description: Makes the vote buttons larger and gives them better contrast.
additional_info:
• Increases the size of voting buttons on both links and comments from 15x14 to 35x20 (this slightly increases the vertical size of link blocks with short titles, but does not otherwise significantly affect layout).
  • Adds a border to unclicked vote buttons.
  • Inverts clicked vote buttons (making them a white arrow on an orange/blue background).
  • Adds a hover effect to vote buttons, similar to that of RES' expandos.
  • All images are embedded in the stylesheet; no server calls are made.
  • Overrides subreddit styles, but I have not yet found a subreddit where this causes layout issues.
  • Works with RES.
